articles.author: Steve Holland, Andrew Osborn, Darya Korsunskaya
articles.description: U.S. President Donald Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin met face-to-face for almost three hours over Moscow's war in Ukraine on Friday, the Kremlin said, as the two world leaders sought an end to the deadliest conflict in Europe in 80 years.
articles.title: Trump-Putin direct talks over Ukraine conclude as summit stretches on
